args.name: ammo
args.annotation: The unit to be spawned as ammo. Optional if the unit is melee.

args.name: ammoX
args.annotation: The x coordinate to spawn the ammo at.

args.name: ammoY
args.annotation: The y coordinate to spawn the ammo at.

args.name: ammoDx
args.annotation: The velocity at Ox to to spawn the ammo with.

args.name: ammoDy
args.annotation: The velocity at Oy to to spawn the ammo with.

args.name: damage
args.annotation: Amount of damage the unit does to its enemy. Used only in melee combat

args.name: speed
args.annotation: The speed to charge with!

invocationArgs.name: shouldReturn
invocationArgs.annotation: Optional. Determines whether the unit will charge back to his original position.

invocationArgs.name: unit
invocationArgs.annotation: The id of the unit to summon

invocationArgs.name: unitX
invocationArgs.annotation: The x coordinate to spawn the summoned unit at.

invocationArgs.name: unitY
invocationArgs.annotation: The y coordinate to spawn the summoned unit at.

invocationArgs.name: unitDx
invocationArgs.annotation: The velocity at Ox to to spawn the summoned unit with.

invocationArgs.name: unitDy
invocationArgs.annotation: The velocity at Oy to to spawn the summoned unit with.

name: points

args.name: color
args.annotation: The color to draw the points with

args.name: font
args.annotation: The font to draw the points with

args.name: x
args.annotation: The x coordinate of the point where to draw the points

args.name: y
args.annotation: The y coordinate of the point where to draw the points

annotation: Saves and draws on the screen the player`s points.

name: unit-generator

invocationArgs.name: unit
invocationArgs.annotation: The name of the unit to spawn.

invocationArgs.name: unitX
invocationArgs.annotation: The x coordinate to spawn the generated unit at.

invocationArgs.name: unitY
invocationArgs.annotation: The y coordinate to spawn the generated unit at.

invocationArgs.name: unitDx
invocationArgs.annotation: The velocity at Ox to to spawn the generated unit with.

invocationArgs.name: unitDy
invocationArgs.annotation: The velocity at Oy to to spawn the generated unit with.

annotation: Used to spawn units from unit prototypes. Other modules depend on this one.

args.name: unit
args.annotation: The name of the unit to spawn.

args.name: interval
args.annotation: The interval to spawn the unit at.

args.name: unitX
args.annotation: The x coordinate to spawn the generated unit at.

args.name: unitY
args.annotation: The y coordinate to spawn the generated unit at.

args.name: unitDx
args.annotation: The velocity at Ox to to spawn the generated unit with.

args.name: unitDy
args.annotation: The velocity at Oy to to spawn the generated unit with.

args.name: interval
args.annotation: The time in ms to execute the specified action

args.name: target
args.annotation: The target to execute your method on begining with # for single unit followed by id, . for a class of units, and no prefix for a module.

args.name: action
args.annotation: The action to execute on the target.

args.name: args
args.annotation: Parameters to the object's action
